   Current offers   OPUS & Cie new subscribers can get 1 extra month free when joining by February 10, 2018.The Loyalty fare is back too!  			Check the below pages for details.     Employees   Did you know that if your employer joins the OPUS & Cie program, you could receive significant discounts on public transit fares?   More information about OPUS & Cie   Employers   Companies joining the program agree to contribute financially to the purchase of OPUS & Cie subscriptions by their employees. In turn, the STM agrees to match that discount, up to a maximum of 10%.   More information about OPUS & Cie and register your company
